participant_1.background:
I keep fit by weeding and doing yard work in my garden.
i am in preschool.
i have red hair.
one of my favorite hobbies is gaming.
I once wrote a song about a local legend in my town and got to perform it at the local music festival.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy painting, but I could never be a painter if I were blind.
I'd brag about the fact that I'm still close to my friends despite all the fame.
my favorite food is italian.
I am most proud of my ability to remain positive in spite of my circumstances.
I walk through my new mansion and admire all the places where I can use my power tools to make it even better.

content.text: I love gaming.  I once wrote a song about a local legend in my town and got to perform it at the local music festival.
I enjoy painting, but I could never be a painter if I were blind.
I like to keep fit by weeding and doing yard work in my garden.
I walk through my new mansion and admire all the places where I can use my power tools to make it even better.
I am in preschool.  I have red hair.
I'd brag about the fact that I'm still close to my friends despite all the fame.
I am most proud of my ability to remain positive in spite of my circumstances.
What kind of power tools do you like to use?
I like to use power tools for woodworking.
